"new"
It is new. Animations and voice may be the same, but the model is different. And if you dont own the other skin, that means all of it is new to you. Which means its worth 1350.

Im buying all of them. Theyre all so damn perfect and amazing and we need more. More star guardians and more pajama guardians.

Theyre just overshadowed by the amazing leona skins coming out as well. Also those other 2 things no one plays and arent supports.
no, they were overshadowed by insane prices like asking us to pay 10$ for a chroma
They arent chromas. Chromas dont use different models, just change colors and details on existing models.

they're made with less effort than the star guardian skins though, but hey they're technically worth the same because of the quality of the skin. concept, animations, particles, the majority of the designs through color schemes are all finished. all they needed to do was make the new model and the splash art. 

In my opinion this practice is incredibly lazy despite the appearance of the skins themselves and feel more like a quick cash grab from a popular skin line than anything else. For that same reason I personally won't buy or endorse these skins but if you enjoy them feel free to buy them, it's your money so all the power to you for spending it on what you want.

I personally would rather spend it on something with more effort and creativity behind it though.

Which is literally why its a 750 skin if you own star guardian. Because thats what the 750 price point is for. Updated model.

If you dont own a star guardian, then its worth 1350 because it has updated particles animations and some voice lines etc.

I understand that but even still, I personally don't enjoy this practice of recycled skins  by simply making alternate versions of popular skins, with K/DA Ahri being a more defendable case but still coming down to a remodel of Popstar Ahri and the Pajama Guardians just being the Star Guardian skin line in all ways except for the model.

I understand the appeal of these kinds of things but I'm worried this will eventually come at the cost of overall creativity of all skins as it'll become more common practice to simply republish a popular skin line with the same popular champions with a new model to grab a quick buck.

K/DA Ahri and Popstar Ahri are 2 very different skins. Popstar was a 2013 released 975 skin and K/DA was a 2018 released 1350 skin. There is a bigger amount of work that went into the K/DA one vs the Popstar one.  They also put the lore behind it as to why she is where she is, because in our reality the skin was chosen by (G)I-dle Member Miyeon who was the singer for Ahri in the song (as they had each Artist chose the character they wanted).

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=u28EqMIE,comment-id=0008000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-09T20:28:51.904+0000)

There is a bigger amount of work that went into the K/DA one vs the Popstar one.  They also put the lore behind it as to why she is where she is, because in our reality the skin was chosen by (G)I-dle Member Miyeon who was the singer for Ahri in the song (as they had each Artist chose the character they wanted).

Yeah, Popstar Ahri is a k-pop music star wearing a corset, tights, high heels, jacket, and shorts. K/DA Ahri, on the other hand, is a k-pop music star _from a different k-pop band_ wearing a corset, tights, high heels, and _no jacket or shorts_. TOTALLY DIFFERENT. WHY DOES ANYONE THINK THEY'RE EVEN REMOTELY SIMILAR. I DON'T KNOW.

Did not know about the backstory to the chosen champions, though as I said, K/DA Ahri was a defendable case though I still easy to compare to Popstar Ahri. and even still I'm more talking about skins and their design process as a whole rather than current specifics though I must admit, the way K/DA Ahri was implimented through her lore did make me like her addition to the group a lot more.

But either way. like I said, I'm more worried about cases like Pajama Guardians, Lancer Blitzcrank and Eclipse Leona with the PJ Guardians being the worst offenders and Lancer Blitz and Eclipse Leona at least having enough features to make for interesting separated skins.

I think it's an interesting idea myself, it opens up a lot more ideas for skins out there.  For existing skins it does offer up a lot of variation in ideas, as if someone doesn't like something the original skin had in its design then they don't have to pick it up and can grab the variant. 

Seeing as they have adjusted the pricing for the 1350s at to become 742 if you own one since it is just a model change and a slightly lower price of 1001(?) for the Legendaries as they still have a bit more, I don't think it's nearly as bad as it was. If they do add that pricing to things like Blitz though they'd better be giving out refunds (js).

Given all the other skins we got this patch and the numerous others in with the pajama guardians... I have no complaints or fears.

Besides, people have been asking for more 750 skins.

I think they are amazing. It's part of a clear, coordinated effort to build storylines and characters out of skin lines, and frankly, I love the direction. 

This isn't the particular skin line that's going to cause me to open my wallet, but there are a few that would...
